website_summaries.verdict: A very good unit that is easy to use, but camera struggles to capture some moving objects clearly.
pros: Razor sharp HD, great sensor to lock video in case of collision, comes with big memory card and large, bright screen
cons: Flimsy power cord and struggles to capture moving objects well

customer_reviews.title: All-in-all, it’ll do the primal job well
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this camera as a replacement for its previous model. Not much has changed. I’m still annoyed that I have to buy my own USB cable because the long cable provided only provides power. The long cable WILL NOT let you download videos. It takes very nice quality videos during day light. At night, it’s hit or miss but very rarely do I ever see past my headlights. Also, the sound recorder does not pick up in car audio well. But that’s an either hate it or love it feature (I personally turn mine off) For its price point, the camera provides very nice quality videos that I cannot complain about.
customer_reviews.author: jake694537

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it’s junk.
customer_reviews.text: I would avoid this product it has extra features like motion detection and park monitoring but if you use them it glitches out and won’t record more then a min or so at a time before it freezes and restarts the only way it works is if you leave the factory settings and even then it doesn’t loop record you have to format the Sd card every time it’s full.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dash camera for your car! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the camera for a few weeks now and love it. It was easy to use, right out of the box. And, the picture quality is excellent! It's been easy to automatically record and then connect the camera to my computer to download the videos periodically when needed. I really love features like the automatic recording, looping new recordings over old videos when space runs out, and the parking mode.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Coleman

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: When plugged it up it start having the electrical burn smell. I never got a chance to do anything with it.
customer_reviews.author: edstew2

customer_reviews.title: Design or Quality Problems
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Z3 from Z-Edge. My first one from 2018 developed an error at ignition that asked “Recover movie?” This new Z3 does not turn on automatically when I start the car. I have to turn it on manually each time. I sent an email to customer support; eight hours later I received an unhelpful reply asking me if the power is on all the time. I am returning this one and buying another brand. For what it’s worth, I have a Z-Edge T3 in my other car and it works fine. I think there is a design or quality problem with the Z3 model.
customer_reviews.author: TriDad

customer_reviews.title: dont buy pure junk
customer_reviews.text: ordered first unit san disk would not lock into housing on camera,,,sent back asked for replacement, second unit arrives , will not power up,,, that's it two strikes your out move back to best buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: full tool
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be a lot cheaper than I bought in China then I bought it for my friend. My friend still likes it very much, she said that the operation is more convenient. Recently, the temperature difference is large, and my friend said that it is working in the same state as at normal temperature. Recording video is very sensitive even when shaking. It is small in size and the accessories are quite complete. The quality of the image is fairly nice. And the night vision effect is also very good. She is satisfied with the range of shooting. It is a surprise that it has a Wifi-connection.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: The camera didn't start recording when the power was turned on. I had it wired in so the power would come on and off with the vehicle. This happened a few times. It has 1 LED light and you cant tell when it wasn't recording. This happened a few times also. I returned it. Support is via email. Leaves a lot to be desired. I had a previous version and that had to be replaced also. When power was applied it wouldn't record but come up with a "movie recovery" screen. If you didn't pay attention and reset it...you wouldn't be recording when you were driving.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product
customer_reviews.text: Recently, I put it in using windshield suction right underneath to my back mirror. It has been recording with the SIM card with a loop. Especially at night, it was recording pretty clear with night vision. Able to adjust all those reflection from the light. It has auto off on the screen for powersave mode while driving and recording itself. I am satisfy this one I have in my mini van. It is more secure now and people are driving nonsense in holiday season. This is the best dash cam I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: Mike Roach

customer_reviews.title: 3 days and it failed
customer_reviews.text: I have a screen with no image and it will not turn off. Had it in the truck for 3 days
customer_reviews.author: grace1029

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE AND INSTALL.
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS DASHCAM 3 MONTHS AGO AND SO FAR SO GOOD. I INSTALLED IT IN MINUTES AND IT POWERS UP AND DOWN WHEN I START-STOP THE MOTOR. IT LOOP RECORDS IN 5 MINUTE SEGMENTS ON A MICRO SD CARD WHICH I CAN VIEW ON MY COMPUTER WITH AN SD ADAPTER. THE LAST CHEAP ONE I BOUGHT ($35.00) LASTED ABOUT ONE YEAR AND KONKED OUT...HOPEFULLY, THIS ONE WILL LAST A LOT LONGER.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great Product,  A  must have
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Dash cam for the rear windshield. I find that many drivers have to tailgate you. In the event of an accident, I have a complete record of the occurrence. Also the camera is a deterrent. The camera performs well, I highly recommend this unit. I have 2 cameras , front and back. A picture is worth a thousand words.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Stoyeck

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 months. Replacement worked for only 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: First camera lasted 3 months of use then stopped working. Contacted the company and was sent a replacement. The replacement only lasted a month before it stopped working as well. Not sure why the "upgraded" model doesn't seem to last. I still have the original model of this cam from 3 years ago, still working just fine. The cam seems like a quality build, but it just doesn't hold up. I wanted to like this cam as much as I have the original model. Really disappointed and will have to try out another brand.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and unreliable recording
customer_reviews.text: I have the original version of this camera and it works fine. This version regularly glitches by beeping unless you reset it by holding the power button for 30 seconds. Also, when I have gone to check footage (once scraped by a biker and recently hit by metal falling off a truck on the highway) the footage wasn't there, but way older footage was. The internal battery on this and the original version are terrible and once it dies the timestamp resets. It's cheap though, so maybe that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Hair of the Damned

customer_reviews.title: functional product
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this dash cam from my collegue's car and he highly recommend me get one. After experiencing two accidents within one year, I finally realize how important the dash cam is and decided to get this... So far it has good performance, it is eazy to install and the video is clear enough. They have 4 little attachment for you to arrange the cable in your car to get rid of the chaos. However, the cable is so long, and apparently 4 attachemnt is not enough...I wish to have more
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: This is just another run of the mill, average dash cam that will last you 6 months, if you’re lucky. After 4 months it started acting up and I tried different memory cards and power cords, but this thing died and won’t even turn on now.
customer_reviews.author: EdNope

customer_reviews.title: trash you can't rely on
customer_reviews.text: Yet another trash product. This was my 2nd warranty replacement. Will not record - "fragmented memory card" error. Did firmware upgrade per email conversation, tried with 2 other sd cards, recording icon is up but nothing saved to sd card. This was the final straw as it did not catch a road rage incident. These should illegal to sell in the US. Save your money and buy a BlackVue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The unit is small, lightweight and has a design that allows it to hug the windshield if you use the adhesive mount. In my vehicle, it causes zero additional obstruction of view because it's located in the area already blocked by my rear view mirror. User interface is very easy to use and setup is super fast. Software for viewing recorded data is awesome, very informative and many features available.
customer_reviews.author: QY

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use, easy to install, and good quality for the money. I like it, and was very pleased to see it even came with an 32g card. It works out of the box with nothing needed but a few minutes to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: David Nash

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great video
customer_reviews.text: The video quality during the day is great and looks incredible. Driving along the lakes in MN with the color changing leaves looks amazing and it's fairly easy to use. The night shot is a hit or miss but I feel like a lot of people who have dash cams don't even use them during the night so that's good. I like the size and discreetness level since the camera is black. It's not too big so it doesn't obstruct your view at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Burger

customer_reviews.title: Good product and support
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday, and it took me about 15 minutes to set up. Youtube reviews are overwhelmingly positive. What made up my mind was the prompt response from the manufacturer here at Amazon to complaints and defects, and their expressed willingness to correct any deficiencies. So I know I was buying a product that will be adequately supported should I need it. And the thing works great!
customer_reviews.author: David Quinn

customer_reviews.title: P.O.S.
customer_reviews.text: Almost lasted a year... First it started freezing during recording after about 90 seconds. Now it just stays on the start up screen and makes a repetitive noise, can’t even turn it off. Picture quality was so-so, while it worked. Easy to set up. Good field of view. Other than that, nothing too exciting.
customer_reviews.author: toiletfighter

customer_reviews.title: Memory card
customer_reviews.text: I set it up the way I wanted to my situations on the road,parking etc. Perfect,but after 3 days being ON,suddenly message came, ,,NO MEMORY CARD'' Memory card came together,was ok until now,so I changed to same amount of GB to different one from the store,now it's fine. Like that memory card run out of free space,even after I tried to format it on my PC.
customer_reviews.author: Radoslaw Janucik

customer_reviews.title: clear pic ,easy to install
customer_reviews.text: For every driver,you guys need this cam,be safe,be save.there are also several languages in the manual.chinese.english.korean.spanish...This video is very clear, easy to install and set up.instructions are easy to follow and the entire process took about 10minutes.thank you to let me found this store and got this professional camera.
customer_reviews.author: xiahengli

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Installing this was easy. It's basically plugging in and it turns on automatically. So when I start the car and plug the power, it starts recording. Quality is great and it's pretty easy to play with.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Z EDGE Z3 Upgraded Version Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: Z EDGE Z3 Upgraded Version Dash Cam works great , easy to install , night vision is very good , I was driving on a dark country road and small something run across the road in front of me , did not know what is was , reviewed the dash cam later and saw it was a small dog , it was a very clear picture for only having on head lights. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: poor picture quality
customer_reviews.text: audio does not turn off even when the camera says it is off you go back to watch footage and it is playing the audio. even on low sesitivity the impact sensors go off and save footage when driving in canyons filling storage space fast. drove to work first day it got really hot and frooze. got home put it right back in the box and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: mikah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he is obsessed! He loves everything about it, no complaints. Turns off when the car does and comes on when the car does and it’s easy to operate and configure the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 3 months garbage & they ignore u
customer_reviews.text: Product stop working out of warranty email tech help week 2 no response so u decide if u want to throw ur $$ away
customer_reviews.author: gregory spurdis

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product is very deceiving...first you have to read the instructions with a magnifying glass. Second, the settings you put in don't stay. Third, when the camera is on recording, it goes off after 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay J.

customer_reviews.title: No disapointments.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set-up. I like the fact that you can see the whole screen with the picture and all the recording information clearly. I had a Rexing and I could not stand it. Always turning it self off and having to reboot it. The Z-Edge is not as concealed as the Rexing but totally out ranks the Rexiing.
customer_reviews.author: Showroom Benny

customer_reviews.title: A bad product
customer_reviews.text: This dashcam is the worst dashcam I’ve ever used. It randomly stops recording while I’m driving, randomly records corrupted files, and you can’t even see how much space is left on your SD card. I’m going to buy a different brand after having this one for only a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: James Hegeman

customer_reviews.title: I love my sweet little carema!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am quite satisfied, highly recommend this camera. Its easy install and high quality records so far. Even evening vision is also excellent.That make me feels safe and makes me know if anyone is messing near the car.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dash cam. Takes time to get used to the settings but overall I am happy that I chose this one. I’ve had it for about 2 months and the picture quality is amazing. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alexander roig

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The older Z3 is much better than this “upgraded version”. Really not a fan of this new upgraded version. Picture quality is worse and every time i start the car date and time resets. Date stamp also does not show.
customer_reviews.author: Sheras S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This camera was very lightweight, yet sturdy. It had a sleek appearance and it worked extremely well. Would definitely recommend as a gift, especially near the holidays. Since it contains all the items that you need, you don't need to purchase anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always protected on the road
customer_reviews.text: Compare the other one i bought This is away better. Come with 32gb memory. Hd and wide screen. Working good at night time. 5 min. install.(watched from you tube) any way additional protection.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie D.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is very easy to use. price is reasonable.Ilike it so much 。Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Feifei Li

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. I tried other cams but they all said hd but actual quality never as good as z edge z3. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace due to it stopped recording. Also, had to constantly reset device. They shipped new one and just un boxed and screen looks like it’s damaged and will not boot up.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Velozo

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Awful! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe Amazon sells garbage like this! I bought FOUR of them. A few months later, NONE of them work. Disgusted. $500...thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully the Z 3 "Upgrade" will stand the test of time versus my previous Z 3.
customer_reviews.text: Likes - Easy to install, voice act active install, wide angle lens, easy of previous return, picture quality Dislikes - None reported at this time
customer_reviews.author: David Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Should be standard in every car!!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and Easy to use, works great. Takes really great videos
customer_reviews.author: Shon Cooke

customer_reviews.title: No report on defective products
customer_reviews.text: Does work, can’t tell you much . Wrote to the mfg with no response
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Colihan

customer_reviews.title: Total waste
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t open this until recently and it won’t even power on. Total waste!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with A12
customer_reviews.text: Love this dash camera. It's better than mine old one. A12 chip is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: gump

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but don't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Good pictures and videos but don't last long, burn out in 4 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: POS, it died in a week. no customer service. Could not return. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much it works better than I thought
customer_reviews.author: armando

customer_reviews.title: High End Quality, with very stable Operating System.
customer_reviews.text: Pursached this Dash-Camera by recommendation, I am very satisfied off the start. ***Will provide a 3 month, 6 month, & 1 Year update for everyone*** * 3 Month Update: Working perfectly. Already came in handy for a road rage incident. I was able to play back video to police on location.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you drive a lot
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that this camera did not shutdown under the summer California heat (inside car can go up to 120F)!! It is a must for me since I drove so much everyday in LA traffic, my highest record is 3 minor car accidents in one month.... Anyway, here are the reason why I like it - Small and discrete - GREAT picture and sound quality - User friendly menus and operation - Reliable in high and low temps - Easy to copy videos to a PC - Comes with everything needed for install
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Chi

customer_reviews.title: Great Dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for a few months. Picture quality is really good. It is better on a sunny clear day (like any other photo or video). Only issue I had with this product was it wasn't saving the date/time properly which in turn would cause the saved files to be out of order. Amazon customer service was unable to resolve the issue. It seems as when the camera was off, the date and time would stop as well or was a day/several hours behind the current date until it was turned back on. I used the feature where it turns on and off when the engine does as my vehicle has one of those plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Clear and battery life is long
customer_reviews.text: My car got crashed last week and I don’t have any proof for that. So then I immediately purchase a car camera to protect myself for the future. This camera is so clear and with no doubt it lasts long for recording. I am feeling better with a car camera in my car. I definitely will recommend this product to my friends and family for safety issue!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: After months, stops recording in minutes
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use we're having issues with the cameras consistently recording. Minutes after plugging in it stops recording rock is unacceptable. Additionally, the night vision/HDR is awful. The Rexing camera I had before this was much better. I'm very disappointed, I bought two of these for front and back cameras essentially burning $200+ on something that doesn't work properly anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: A highly recommended car camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to install in my girlfriend's small car. Picture is very clear, and the setting is flexible and has a lot of options that can be customized. The instruction for installation and setting is easy to follow and did not bother me much. The view is also quite wide with a large adjustable angle. It is awesome to come with a 32GB memory card, so I don't have to worry about deleting data very often. She loves this camera so much, so I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Yango

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: The dashcam arrived DOA. I followed the instructions and the dashcam never powered up.
customer_reviews.author: Severino E. Encarnac

customer_reviews.title: clear images day and night
customer_reviews.text: received the dash cam last week, after one week usage, i really this one for following reason: 1. extra long cable and dual ports USB adapters- easy to use it. 2. parking mode ( most dash cam doesn't have this function) 3. clear images day and night the quality seems very good, so far, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Works really well - no problems ..
customer_reviews.text: The 1440P has noticeably better definition than a standard 1080P dash cam. (I still have a standard 1080P dash cam in my wife's car for comparison) The videos are not "choppy" and don't have macroblocks on the side. This indicates that algorithm used to save the videos is well thought out. I also like that it is NOT a dash cam with a superwide 170 degree field of view. The 155 degree field of view on this unit is just about right. Night time videos are good. The camera apparently does not need much light to give work well at night.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L.

customer_reviews.title: Love this dashcam so much I bought a second one..
customer_reviews.text: A top quality product. Excellent presentation in the box. Everything you need included. Owners manual clear and to the point. 5 minute setup. RAZOR sharp video quality ( I purchased a 128 gb card ). Audio is a nice addition. Easy plug and play review of video from my computers. Bought a second one today for my other car. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AP777

customer_reviews.title: THIS is a great cam er
customer_reviews.text: You never know when something like this will cameraacome in handy given today's litigious society so it’s best to be protected. This is a great camera and extremely easy to set-up. It took me more time to run the line then it did to update and set the camera itself. The picture on the camera itself is good and gives you a reminder of placement and what it’s capturing
customer_reviews.author: Serena Wood

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is very good quality,easy to install,If the screen is bigger,it’s better,the image is very clear,and the best is to have a memory card,I like it。
customer_reviews.author: lean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality camera
customer_reviews.text: So far so good although sometimes requires reset to “kill” noise sound
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Find a better camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great videos but incomplete software. Unable to turn off sound recording. With resets button, default factory reset did not help. Camera likes to shut off and on as well on its own.
customer_reviews.author: vadim ilchuk

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably good picture! I wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: montana3802

customer_reviews.title: Great Cam
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this in my car, would definitely recommend to get it if you do a lot of driving.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Henrickson

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one for my mother and told her I would only get her the best.
customer_reviews.author: henry frison

product_meta.title: Z-Edge Z3 Upgraded Version Dash Cam, 1440P Quad HD Car Dashboard Camera with Ambarella A12 Chipset, 3-Inch Screen, Super HDR Night Vision, 155-Degree Wide Angle and 32GB Memory Card Included
feature_bullets: YOUR EXPERT WITNESS: The best dash camera 2016 voted by Wirecutter just got even better - records Ultra HD 2.5K video featuring the latest A12 Ambarella chipset and CMOS image sensor - market leading reliability and image quality in all light conditions - avoids pricey, unnecessary features such as GPS and WiFi

ULTRA 2.7K IMAGE QUALITY: Never miss a license plate in stunning Wide Quad HD (WQHD) 2560x1440P and 155-degree viewing angle at 30 frames per second - capture more detail at a distance with optimized field-of-view for minimal fisheye image distortion - featuring 3.0" display screen

HDR NIGHT VISION: Enable High Dynamic Range (HDR) for superior low light compensation when driving at night - reacts to extreme light conditions just like your eye, balancing exposure and light/dark spots - six glass lenses reduce glare and deliver superior video quality - essential for capturing consistent image detail across a variety of light conditions

AUTOMATIC SAFEGUARDS: Records automatically on vehicle ignition - switches off automatically with ignition off - energy saving LCD screen off timer - loop recording feature for efficient storage management - manual and automatic video protection from deletion - one button audio recording on/off - built-in G-sensor/accelerometer triggers motion/crash vibration detection recording - parking mode watchdog for 24/7 surveillance of your vehicle

BUY FROM US: Now 32GB SD memory card inside every pack- Support up to 128GB card (most other models can only support up to 64GB card) - solid suction mount with screw-in attachment, fully adjustable for best viewing and quickly removable - extra long 13-foot USB cable for easy routing inside your vehicle's interior - Dual port USB adapter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars162 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
